description: This is a modern 'Pods View' dashboard for your Kubernetes cluster(s). Made for kube-prometheus-stack and take advantage of the latest Grafana features. GitHub repository: https://github.com/dotdc/grafana-dashboards-kubernetes

targets.expr: sum(rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", image!="", container!=""}[$__rate_interval])) by (pod) / sum(kube_pod_container_resource_limits{namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", resource="cpu"}) by (pod)

sum(container_memory_working_set_bytes{namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", image!="", container!=""}) by (pod) / sum(kube_pod_container_resource_limits{namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", resource="memory"}) by (pod)

sum(container_memory_working_set_bytes{namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod" , image!="", container!=""}) by (pod) / sum(kube_pod_container_resource_limits{namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod" , resource="memory"}) by (pod)>0.998

sum(rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", image!="", container!=""}[$__rate_interval])) by (pod) / sum(kube_pod_container_resource_limits{namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", resource="cpu"}) by (pod) >=0.989

panels.title: CPU usage by pod in $namespace namespace

title: incidentes_analitics-v2
